list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a point or level beyond which something does not or may not extend or pass.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giới hạn 10 phút về bài phát biểu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a restriction on the size or amount of something permissible or possible.
a point or value that a sequence, function, or sum of a series can be made to approach progressively, until it is as close to the point or value as desired.
set or serve as a limit to.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: try to limit the amount you drink
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cố gắng giới hạn số tiền bạn uống
